de.mrapp.android.dialog.model

Interface AnimateableDialogDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dialog
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimateableDialog, ButtonBarDialog, ListDialog, ScrollableDialog, ValidateableDialog
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAnimateableDialog, AbstractButtonBarDialog, AbstractListDialog, AbstractScrollableDialog, AbstractValidateableDialog, AnimateableDialogDecorator, MaterialDialog, ProgressDialog

    public interface AnimateableDialogDecorator
extends Dialog
    Defines the interface a decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of an animateable dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices, must implement.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        Dialog.Gravity

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.mrapp.android.dialog.model.Dialog

        MATCH_PARENT, WRAP_CONTENT
